categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Destruction of the Coyerti Imperial garrison

During the Coyerti campaign in 3 ABY, the Coyerti Imperial garrison was under attack by the Alliance to Restore the Republic's 61st Mobile Infantry. Late battle, it was destroyed by a large number of Coyerti.
The destruction of the Coyerti Imperial garrison was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
